# penjumlahan
a. 1101+1101=011010

13+13=26

b. 11101+11011=0111000

29+27=56

c. 110110101+101011010=01100001111

437+346=783

# pengurangan
a. 10101-10011=10

21-19=2

b. 110010-101101=0101

50-45=5

c. 100110-11001=01101

38-25=13

# perkalian

6x5=30
